title: On the Validity of Bounds on Light Axions for $f\lesssim10^{15}$ GeV
abstract:
Light bosonic dark matter fields that can be treated like a classical wave
have non-linear field values close to massive bodies. Here we make the
important observation that the quadratic interactions of axion dark matter lead
to a divergence of the axion field value resulting in a non-physical parameter
space for values of the decay constant of $f\lesssim 10^{15}$ GeV. We identify
experimental observables impacted by this effect and those that can avoid it.
